description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Sit down and ante up, it's Poker Night. Enjoy over 30 different poker games with your friends or by yourself. Includes such favorites as: 5 card draw, Texas Hold'em, Omaha, Baseball, Follow the Queen, Badugi and many, many more.
